Reviews.Title: “Woke up at 4am by the porter!”
Reviews.Author: Andy B
Reviews.Content: expect prison hotel breakfast ok cornflakes cornflakes checked straight watch football returned midnight straight sleep 4am poster woke demanding reception pay woken half hotel shouting knocking door didnt payment arrival 4am time couldnt sleep spoilt weekend

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, in need of an update but acceptable”
Reviews.Author: ahilton
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights mum found price paid hotel close london reasonable couple minor issues drawers wipe tv remote missing easily resolved hotel bit update regards cleanliness slightly annoying wifi didnt connect checking emails quickly sitting lobby fine breakfast basic cereal toast jam tea juice considering price paid didnt expect staff friendly helpful service 5 minutes walk wembley central tube 30 mins london tube close explore capital overall stay price

Reviews.Title: “dirty”
Reviews.Author: famousdaisy5
Reviews.Content: unfortunatly stay dissapointing cost £135 stay 2 nights beginning firstly car park squeeze car park massive skip plonked beds lying truely awful check god damp spots wall stunk damp food stains walls wires floor carpets sticky 6 sockets shower people werent using showers walls paper thin doors secure huge gaps door person bathroom ie using shower toliet mean squeeky floor boards thats time choose stay hotel close wembley arena 10 minutes walk plenty shops resturants time travel lodge id spend recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great location for Wembley Stadium, comfy bed”

Reviews.Content: nice bed comfy gentlemen checked friendly location wembley stadium close wembley central tube station easily accessible central london breakfast pretty typical continental croissant ive enjoyed

Reviews.Title: “About as Euro as the pound!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Greatbritishbreaker
Reviews.Content: hotel false advertising start dont believe pictures website apart front wrong start booked hotel arrived critical size fiance child shower didnt drain sorted mentioned morning called reception tv remote wasnt delivered service industry remember advertised continental breakfast morning comprised cornflakes soggy toast tinned fresh fruit salad im continent proud juices plentiful surprising considering apple juice son tasted urine talking manager morning regarding shower mentioned bed completely knackered basically sleeping broken divan base straight dont worry change guess coming day visiting sites london overall location perfect wembley visiting london 20minutes tube £50 night price tag considering stay country mistake wont london shocking breakfast sleeping comfortable bed disgraceful hope people read overpriced youth hostel thank apologies reception adequate compensation truely memorable stay obvious positve reviews hotel posted staff night shift

Reviews.Title: “Another wonderful stay in this friendly hotel”
Reviews.Author: SussexJanie
Reviews.Content: travelled london status quo wembley arena chose euro wembley hotel choice hotel convenient wembley central tube station feel welcome staff 32 adequate comfortable bed spotless linen spotless ensuite shower bonus hotel quiet location unusual london appreciated 2 nights partying recommended nearby thirsty irish bar wembley arena bar characters welcome karaoke saturday night forget recommend hotel fantasic value money convenience location
